attributes.action: ban crossbows and weapons of any description
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Look at today s Daily Mail to see what a crossbow can do to an animal, which has been shot twice through the head. This is only one step away from using a crossbow against a human. Why are we able to and why would we wish to buy and use a crossbow or any arms?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
